Acceptance criteria are defined.    
The Epics is approved by system architects (done on Epic level). The appoval was done in develpoment circles with subject matter experts    
The Epics is prioritized within the backlog (WSJF Method)    
The Epics are understood by Dev Teams and estimated

Dependencies are identified and there are no external dependencies that canÂ´t be solved within the ART

GUI Views have been defined (in form of click-dummy) and discussed with users for implementation    
Process dependency / adaptations has been defined    

Business Scope:
As a user of the FIB tool I want to be able to request availability on different technical plattforms and see the result in the tool to use it for my quotes. For this the FIB Tool needs to be integrated within the PANDA workflow, as well as the data are needed within the configurators of PANDA (first Company Access Easy).
